item.title: Who am I?
item.description: I am a postdoc and a memeber of the situated cognition research group at the Ruhr-Universität Bochum in Germany. My current research focuses on the psychology and epistemology of conspiracy theories and is realized under a Volkswagen Foundation grant entitled ‘Why do people believe weird things: Bayesain brain, conspiracy theories, and epistemic vices’ which I co-wrote with Prof. Tobias Schlicht. My doctoral research was also conducted at the Ruhr-Universität and was supervised by Tobias Schlicht and Daniel Dennett.
